(i) Given the layer group
(specified by its number), the Wyckoff position and the k vector ( k 1, k 2), the program identifies ( a) the corresponding space-group number and Wyckoff letter, and ( b) the space-group wave vector ( k 1, k 2, k 3) with k 3 = 0, related to the layer-group k vector ( k 1, k 2).
